name: Escape from Zigaroo
description:
Controls:

Up arrow key - Jump

Left,right arrow keys for movement.

Space - Throw distraction beacon

X - Turn into a box

The player is escaping from a lab filled with robots, and the only tools available to him is his nifty wall jump, the fact that robots are distracted by his distraction beacon, and that he can turn into a box in which the enemy will walk past him, only if no enemy was facing him during that time.

Made in July 2018.
